name: Six-Sided Streets
description:
Make a pleasant little town, 3 hexes at a time.

Controls
Click to place pieces.
Use the on-screen buttons, arrow keys, or mouse wheel to rotate your next piece.

Design inspirations
My City (Reiner Knizia)
Tiny Islands (David King)
Cascadia (Randy Flynn)

Developed in 1 month for the Eggplant Podcast Community Game Jam!
